attributes.action: make prisons self sufficient- introduce chain gangs- end parole
attributes.additional_details:
UK prisons could easily pay for themselves through inmates forced labour. chain gangs cleaning beaches, building play areas, removing litter, cleaning canals etc. no work-no food, visits or parole.Human rights belong to victims of crime.
The purpose of imprisonment is twofold, to rehabilitate AND to punish. We have lost the will to punish people, send deterrents, teach and reinforce abiding by law. Prison is no longer a deterrent, it is now merely a tax burden on the working class.
